name: Caldwell - Athenee - Athenee
additionalNotes: Released in 2022, Caldwell's Crafted and Curated series acts as a creative outlet for Robert Caldwell, offering unique blending and sizing experimentation to discerning connoisseurs. Some Crafted and Curated cigars tweak existing Caldwell blends with different components or process, while others are entirely distinctive blends. This Caldwell Crafted and Curated Athenee Robusto Extra cigar is made in Dominican Republic. Outside, you'll find a Habano wrapper. Inside, the binder is, and the filler is Dominican, Nicaraguan. This is a Robusto cigar with a length of 5.25 and a ring gauge of 52.
